name: Speechless (MonoS)
description:
A game where you try to understand a foreign language while having severe learning disabilities.
Also, monsters are trying to kill you using said language so you'd better learn it fast.

This is my first try doing a roguelike, so it's almost shit, but i hope you like it anyway...

Remember to rate on Ludum Dare

Some comments

- I come from a long and heavy background of MUD gaming and i was instantly excited about it.

@StrayByte

- The concept is brilliant, very original. I'd like to see it further developed, [...] I can see how the feeling of uncertainty is really fitting to the main idea

@Ithildin

- I feel different a lot it seems, am I undergoing puberty like every five seconds? All this words made me go trough puberty a few times
